overview:
As Vice President of Celebrity Influencer Networks, Jason comes to EQAL with an eclectic background in multiplatform content creation and development, having been a writer/producer for MTV News/mtv.com, as well as Director of Development for Fuse, the cable music network. As Creative Executive at Mediaedge:cia, Jason developed an extensive slate of branded multiplatform content initiatives for AT&T, and acted as Supervising Producer on “Little Spirit: Christmas in New York,” a Macy’s-branded, animated TV movie on NBC.

Jason has been a Contributing Editor at Flavorpill.com and the Senior Writer for “Gold Rush,” a co-production between AOL and Mark Burnett Productions. Jason’s passion for music has also led him to the music industry, both as A&R Director for the independent label, Razor & Tie, and as Creative Manager for EMI Music Publishing.
